name: Grim Legends: The Dark City - Hidden Object Game
name_original: Grim Legends: The Dark City - Hidden Object Game
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

A rogue agent has stolen a powerful artifact from The Order, unleashing a terrible monster in the process. This demon possesses the ability to change people into evil minions, and has turned a once bright city into a dark prison. As one of the newest members of The Order, you and your mentor have been tasked with finding this relic and bringing it back before the damage is so great that it can’t be reversed!

• CAN YOU RECOVER YOUR LOST MEMORIES?
A year ago, a mission gone awry wiped your mind clean. Will the events of your past be the key to stopping this grim legend?

• FREE THE VICTIMS FROM THESE VILE PARASITES!
Remove the foul curse through a metropolis of gothic hidden object scenes.

• USE YOUR SPECIAL POWERS TO FIGHT THE EVIL
Your training as a monster hunter will help you solve complex puzzles and mystical mini-games.

• ESCAPE THE CRYSTAL PRISON IN THE MAGICAL BONUS CHAPTER
Play another adventure as a different character and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Skeletons, morphing objects, and more!
